ng-add.description: Add The Baum Project and create an Angular application in angular-mat-baum opinionated style.

app.description: Create an Angular application in angular-mat-baum opinionated style.

app-after.description: Continue the application generation after dependencies installs.

component.description: Creates a new component definition in the given or default project.

module.description: Create a feature module in angular-mat-baum opinionated style.

slice.description: Create a new store slice in a feature module store.
